resource.description: The AWS::CloudWatch::CompositeAlarm type specifies an alarm which aggregates the states of other Alarms (Metric or Composite Alarms) as defined by the AlarmRule expression

properties.name: ActionsEnabled
properties.description: Indicates whether actions should be executed during any changes to the alarm state. The default is TRUE.

type.description: Indicates whether actions should be executed during any changes to the alarm state. The default is TRUE.

properties.name: ActionsSuppressor
properties.description: Actions will be suppressed if the suppressor alarm is in the ALARM state. ActionsSuppressor can be an AlarmName or an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) from an existing alarm.

type.description: Actions will be suppressed if the suppressor alarm is in the ALARM state. ActionsSuppressor can be an AlarmName or an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) from an existing alarm.

properties.name: ActionsSuppressorExtensionPeriod
properties.description: Actions will be suppressed if WaitPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.

type.description: Actions will be suppressed if WaitPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.

properties.name: ActionsSuppressorWaitPeriod
properties.description: Actions will be suppressed if ExtensionPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.

type.description: Actions will be suppressed if ExtensionPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.

properties.name: AlarmActions
properties.description: The list of actions to execute when this alarm transitions into an ALARM state from any other state. Specify each action as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

type.description: The list of actions to execute when this alarm transitions into an ALARM state from any other state. Specify each action as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

itemType.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action

properties.name: AlarmName
properties.description: The name of the Composite Alarm

type.description: The name of the Composite Alarm

properties.name: AlarmRule
properties.description: Expression which aggregates the state of other Alarms (Metric or Composite Alarms)

type.description: Expression which aggregates the state of other Alarms (Metric or Composite Alarms)

properties.name: InsufficientDataActions
properties.description: The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the INSUFFICIENT_DATA state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

type.description: The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the INSUFFICIENT_DATA state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

itemType.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action

properties.name: OKActions
properties.description: The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the OK state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

type.description: The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the OK state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

itemType.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action

attributes.description: The AWS::CloudWatch::CompositeAlarm type specifies an alarm which aggregates the states of other Alarms (Metric or Composite Alarms) as defined by the AlarmRule expression

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the alarm

type.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the alarm
